prod_short_desc: Save the lighthouse and rescue the keeper with the Fire Boat!
prod_long_desc:
Put out the lighthouse fire with the LEGO® City Fire Boat, featuring a movable crane arm, stud-shooting water cannon that can knock down the flames, plus a dinghy, firefighting gear, kitchen, medical station and lighthouse jetty. Includes 5 minifigures: the Captain, 2 male firefighters, a female firefighter and the lighthouse keeper.
Build a Fire Boat with a detailed bridge, searchlights, a dinghy, a stud-launching water cannon with movable crane arm, and more!
Shoot the “water” pieces to put out the “fire” at the buildable lighthouse with a pier and shack!
Includes boat captain, 2 male and 1 female firefighters, and lighthouse keeper minifigures, plus lots of gear and accessories
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Fire Boat is over 11” high, 12” long, and 6” wide. Lighthouse with pier and shack is over 6” high, 6” wide, and 3” long
412 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old
